archiefmat.titel: Geldelijke deelname van koning Willem I en koning Willem II in ondernemingen: West-Indische Maatschappij, gevestigd te Amsterdam
archiefmat.titel_eng: Monetary participation in enterprises by King Willem I and King Willem II: the West-Indische Maatschappij in Amsterdam
archiefmat.scope: To promote trade King Willem I founded the West-Indische Maatschappij in Amsterdam in 1828; it existed until 1863.
archiefmat.notes:
To facilitate trade, King Willem I founded the West-Indische Maatschappij in Amsterdam in 1828; it existed until 1863.

See in this context A40-VIc-B (Correspondence with private persons) Letter of J. Bondt, 1842.

Also undated records. Only approved consultation permitted.
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: Zie B. De Gaay Fortman, "De West-Indische Maatschappij", in: De West-Indische Gids, 11 (1929-1930) 307-315
